  implicit none

recursive subroutine quicksort(a, first, last)
  implicit none
  integer, intent(inout) :: a(:)
  integer, intent(in) :: first, last
  integer :: pivot, i, j, temp

  if (first < last) then
    pivot = a((first + last)/2)
    i = first
    j = last
    do
      do while (a(i) < pivot)
        i = i + 1
      end do
      do while (a(j) > pivot)
        j = j - 1
      end do
      if (i >= j) exit
      temp = a(i)
      a(i) = a(j)
      a(j) = temp
      i = i + 1
      j = j - 1
    end do
    call quicksort(a, first, j)
    call quicksort(a, j+1, last)
  end if
end subroutine quicksort

program main
  implicit none
  integer :: n, i, count_unique, j
  integer, allocatable :: a(:), unique_a(:)
  logical :: found

  read(*,*) n
  allocate(a(n))
  read(*,*) a

  ! Sort the array
  call quicksort(a, 1, n)

  ! Remove duplicates
  if (n == 0) then
    count_unique = 0
  else
    count_unique = 1
    do i = 2, n
      if (a(i) /= a(i-1)) then
        count_unique = count_unique + 1
      end if
    end do
  end if

  allocate(unique_a(count_unique))
  if (count_unique >= 1) then
    unique_a(1) = a(1)
    j = 1
    do i = 2, n
      if (a(i) /= a(i-1)) then
        j = j + 1
        unique_a(j) = a(i)
      end if
    end do
  end if

  ! Check for three consecutive numbers

  do i = 1, count_unique - 2
    if (unique_a(i+1) == unique_a(i) + 1 .and. unique_a(i+2) == unique_a(i+1) + 1) then
      found = .true.
      exit
    end if
  end do

  if (found) then
    write(*,*) "YES"
  else
    write(*,*) "NO"
  end if

  deallocate(a)
  deallocate(unique_a)

        i = i + 1
        j = j - 1
      end do
      call quicksort(a, first, j)
      call quicksort(a, j+1, last)
    end if
  end subroutine quicksort
